name: @cap-js-community/feature-toggle-library
description: SAP BTP feature toggle library enables Node.js applications using the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model to maintain live-updatable feature toggles via Redis.

scripts.test:prepare: npx shx test -e test-cap-server/node_modules || npm i --package-lock false --prefix test-cap-server
scripts.test:resnap: npm run patch && npm run test:remove-inline-snapshots && npm run test:remove-file-snapshots && npm t -- -u && npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run jsdoc
scripts.lint:fix: npm run prettier:fix && npm run eslint:fix
scripts.docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.docs:install: cd docs && npx shx rm -rf vendor Gemfile.lock && bundle install
scripts.upgrade-lock: npx shx rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run patch

author: Richard Lindner <richard.lindner@sap.com>
